Description: The move comes after US President Donald Trump tried to sign a rare earth minerals agreement with Ukraine.

Description: The abductions come as the Rwanda-backed group continues its rapid military expansion in eastern DR Congo, seizing key cities and escalating one of the most intense conflicts in over a decade.
